name: Stop Motion
description:
Stop Motion is an extreme form of racing, where you can't brake! You are stuck in a loop through the track until you can reach the rival car, that has the braking fluid you need to be able to stop your motion.

Original soundtrack on Soundcloud

Controls:

Turn left [A / <-]
Turn right [D / ->]
Pause [P]
Advance dialog [Any key]
Go to next level after win [Any key]

If you have problems with the browser version (such as audio latency or low framerate) try to download the executable for your OS below, it will most likely run better (although the game was entirely programmed on linux and other versions haven't been thoroughly tested).

Made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 47 Game Jam
